title: 4 Men Wounded in Shooting Outside Brooklyn House Party
content:
Four men were shot outside a home in Brooklyn after leaving a party early Sunday morning, police said.
According to authorities, the men were leaving the party at around 1:30 a.m. when shots rang out near the corner of East 48th Street and Church Avenue in East Flatbush. All four men were shot in the torso.
The victims, who range in age from 19 to 34, were rushed to nearby hospitals where they are expected to recover from their injuries, officials said.
Police believe it is possible two gunmen were involved in the shooting. No arrests have been made and there is no word yet on sparked the violence.
